name.ja: <ruby>諧<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>謔<rt>ぎゃく</rt></ruby>のコスモス<ruby>姫<rt>ひめ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card.

effect.en: Destroy up to 3 monsters on your field. Then, you can Fusion Summon a Galaxy Type monster with 1900 or 2600 DEF by shuffling up to 9 Galaxy Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck as material. This turn, you cannot activate the effect of "Princess Cosmos the Trickster".
